document.heading: Board of Ethics and Government Accountability Amendment Act of 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-75, the “Board of Ethics and Government Accountability Amendment Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-116. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 5, 2013 and December 3, 2013, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 23, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 20-241 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-75 became effective on February 22, 2014.
